name: Media
title: Media
description: A photo, video, or audio recording acquired or used in healthcare. The actual content may be inline or provided by direct reference.

elements.name: Media
elements.description: A photo, video, or audio recording acquired or used in healthcare.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Identifiers associated with the image - these may include identifiers for the image itself, identifiers for the context of its collection (e.g. series ids) and context ids such as accession numbers or other workflow identifiers.

elements.name: basedOn
elements.description: A procedure that is fulfilled in whole or in part by the creation of this media.

elements.name: partOf
elements.description: A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The current state of the media.

elements.name: type
elements.description: A code that classifies whether the media is an image, video or audio recording or some other media category.

elements.name: modality
elements.description: Details of the type of the media - usually, how it was acquired (what type of device). If images sourced from a DICOM system, are wrapped in a Media resource, then this is the modality.

elements.name: view
elements.description: The name of the imaging view e.g. Lateral or Antero-posterior (AP).

elements.name: subject
elements.description: Who/What this Media is a record of.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: The encounter that establishes the context for this media.

elements.name: createdDateTime
elements.description: The date and time(s) at which the media was collected.

elements.name: createdPeriod
elements.description: The date and time(s) at which the media was collected.

elements.name: issued
elements.description: The date and time this version of the media was made available to providers, typically after having been reviewed.

elements.name: operator
elements.description: The person who administered the collection of the image.

elements.name: reasonCode
elements.description: Describes why the event occurred in coded or textual form.

elements.name: bodySite
elements.description: Indicates the site on the subject's body where the observation was made (i.e. the target site).

elements.name: deviceName
elements.description: The name of the device / manufacturer of the device that was used to make the recording.

elements.name: device
elements.description: The device used to collect the media.

elements.name: height
elements.description: Height of the image in pixels (photo/video).

elements.name: width
elements.description: Width of the image in pixels (photo/video).

elements.name: frames
elements.description: The number of frames in a photo. This is used with a multi-page fax, or an imaging acquisition context that takes multiple slices in a single image, or an animated gif.

elements.name: duration
elements.description: The duration of the recording in seconds - for audio and video.

elements.name: content
elements.description: The actual content of the media - inline or by direct reference to the media source file.

elements.name: note
elements.description: Comments made about the media by the performer, subject or other participants.
